Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Alcudia, Viva Eden Lago is close to Albufera Natural Park and Alcudia Port. This 4-star aparthotel is within the region of San Jaume Church and Pollensa Port.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 202 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an outdoor pool, an outdoor tennis court, and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
This aparthotel is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Viva Eden Lago, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
This aparthotel is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Viva Eden Lago, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Alcudia, Viva Eden Lago is close to Albufera Natural Park and Alcudia Port. This 4-star aparthotel is within the region of San Jaume Church and Pollensa Port.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Albufera Natural Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Alcudia Port - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
San Jaume Church - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Pollensa Port - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
Cala Barques - 12.5 km / 7.8 mi
Campanet Caves - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Ufanes Fonts - 12.9 km / 8 mi
Formentor Cape Lighthouse - 18 km / 11.2 mi
Lluc Monastery - 19.4 km / 12.1 mi
Castillo de Alaro - 29 km / 18 mi
Cala Agulla Beach - 30.8 km / 19.2 mi
Puig Mayor - 32.3 km / 20.1 mi
Cala Millor Beach - 33.9 km / 21 mi
Can Prunera Museum of Modernism - 34.2 km / 21.2 mi
Ferrocarril de Soller Train Station - 34.5 km / 21.5 mi

The preferred airport for Viva Eden Lago is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 44.4 km / 27.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
